# VEHICLE::SET_ALLOW_VEHICLE_EXPLODES_ON_CONTACT

## Summary
Use to override the SHOULD_EXPLODE_ON_CONTACT flag from vehicle meta deta

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** set
